title: Aditi Rao Hydari goes topless for a magazine, grabs eyeballs in her sensual avatar (View Pics)
text:
Leaked: Hot pics of reel ‘Radhe Maa’ aka Poonam Jhawer 
New Delhi: Actress Aditi Rao Hydari is known for her sweet shades in Bollywood. She has been a part of few movies but that does not mean she is an unknown one. 
Her last movie ‘Guddu Rangeela’, might have not fared well at the box office but the diva has not lost her charm. 
But, Aditi just nailed the act of shedding her girl-next-door image. She recently went topless for Pernia pop-up's shop magazine. 
If you think it is just another actress showing off her bold side you are mistaken. 
Aditi did not forget to add a royal touch to the topless photo shoot to make it absolutely mesmerizing. 
Check the hot picture here: 
Dressed in a rich Rahul Mishra lehenga with some lovely Sangeeta Boochra jewellery, Aditi looks insanely attractive in this one. Also read: 10 hot pictures of Amy Jackson, Akshay Kumar’s new leading lady! 
This however, is not the only one. Other pictures of her hot photo shoot have also gone viral for all the right reasons. As she exudes feminine charm like never before, with this brave act of hers Aditi has proved that she is in Bollywood to stay. 
Here are some images from her photo shoot which will definitely get the temperature soaring. 
On the movie front, Aditi will be seen next opposite Farhan Akhtar in ‘Wazir’. This movie also stars legendary actor Amitabh Bachchan. 
Well, we hope the actress bags many more projects like this and gets her due success in the industry.
